titles.title: In The Presence Of Your People

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In the presence of Your people I will praise Your name, For alone You are holy, enthroned On the praises of Israel,{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let us celebrate Your goodness And Your steadfast love, For Your name be exalted Here on earth and in heavâ€™n above.{/lang-eng}
